fullText: Bradley Cooper brings his movie-star magnetism to bear on the grotesquely deformed title character in this powerful revival of Bernard Pomerance's 1979 drama.
dtliExcerpt: Bradley Cooper brings his movie-star magnetism to bear on the grotesquely deformed title character in this powerful revival of Bernard Pomerance's 1979 drama.
